document.full_text: the u.s. on tuesday called for china to disclose all its government subsidy programs as beijing backed down in a trade dispute between the world's two leading economies over clean energy technology.
document.title: china has ended some wind power subsidies, u.s. says
lines_and_colors: the u.s. on tuesday called for china to disclose all its government subsidy programs as beijing backed down in a trade dispute between the world's two leading economies over clean energy technology.
